Package foundry.veil.api.client.render.rendertype

Interface VeilRenderTypeAccessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeStateMixin
public interface VeilRenderTypeAccessor
Provides access to the individual shards of a RenderType.

  • Method Details

    • textureState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.EmptyTextureStateShard textureState()
      Returns:
      The Minecraft state deciding what textures should be bound

    • shaderState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.ShaderStateShard shaderState()
      Returns:
      The Minecraft state deciding what ShaderInstance to use

    • transparencyState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.TransparencyStateShard transparencyState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL14C.glBlendFuncSeparate(int, int, int, int)

    • depthTestState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.DepthTestStateShard depthTestState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.GL_DEPTH_TEST

    • cullState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.CullStateShard cullState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.glCullFace(int)

    • lightmapState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.LightmapStateShard lightmapState()
      Returns:
      The Minecraft state determining if the LightTexture should be enabled

    • overlayState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.OverlayStateShard overlayState()
      Returns:
      The Minecraft state determining if the OverlayTexture should be enabled

    • layeringState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.LayeringStateShard layeringState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.glPolygonOffset(float, float) or RenderSystem.getModelViewStack()

    • outputState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.OutputStateShard outputState()
      Returns:
      The state of what framebuffer to write into

    • texturingState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.TexturingStateShard texturingState()
      Returns:
      The Minecraft state intended to call RenderSystem.setTextureMatrix(Matrix4f)

    • writeMaskState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.WriteMaskStateShard writeMaskState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.glColorMask(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) and GL11C.glDepthMask(boolean)

    • lineState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.LineStateShard lineState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.glLineWidth(float)

    • colorLogicState

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard.ColorLogicStateShard colorLogicState()
      Returns:
      The state of GL11C.glLogicOp(int)

    • outlineProperty

      net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderType.OutlineProperty outlineProperty()
      Returns:
      The outline property state

    • states

      List<net.minecraft.client.renderer.RenderStateShard> states()
      Returns:
      An immutable view of all states in the render type
